name: Purex
description:
Arcade game about contraception which is finally available in the future to men. 

Have fun trying it, only keyboard needed.

*****************************************************************************************************

Hey dudes !

Have you ever felt like modern contraception is a little too gendered ?! Here at Purex, we found a solution ! 

From now, you got your own male contraceptive pill ! Finally ! 

But beware fellas ! You still have to :

  • avoid babies
  • avoid alcohol
  • take your pill when reminder says so
  • use condoms 
  • sometimes look for the morning after pill ! 
  • Oh, and also, some pain might hurt you, there's nothing against that.

Just like a woman, now.

PS: try reach 300 000 score for hardest difficulty !

************************************************************************************

Made for the ScoreSpace Jam 17 in 48 hours with "Protection" as theme.


(For better experience, try the .exe download)
